Articles.Content:
Come check out my new science career mode!

Join Ozzy for the beginning of his new science mode career in KSP!

The goal? To unlock and use some of the amazing tech in near future to allow us to build an epic interplanetary station, while using some other really great mods along the way.

http://www.twitch.tv/ozzyinspace

See you there!

(typical stream times today will be from now until about 4pm CST, and then again from about 5:30-11pm CST - and usually M-F starting at 6pm, and as often as I can on weekends)
